oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agricultural Innovation Systems: A Framework for Analysing the Role of the Government
oai_dc:dc.Publisher: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Overview of agricultural innovation systems, outlining the main issues and trends (Part I), and develops a framework to analyze the role of government in fostering the creation and adoption of innovation in the agricultural and agri-food sector, i.e. primary agriculture, upstream and downstream industries (Part II). This reference is directly related to the discussion in the G20 that led to the creation of TAP
